lines.i: Statement of the problem by the patient or provider, including duration, system, and whether it is the chief complaint

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.63"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11169)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10768)/@code="10154-3" Chief complaint Narrative - Reported (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10769)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11170)
effectiveTime.low = NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="ST" (CONF:10770)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.04

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10771)
This entryRelationship contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Complaint Duration

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10772)
This entryRelationship contains at least one [1..*] observation, where its type is Complaint Type

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:10773), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AnatomicLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.76 DYNAMIC (CONF:10774)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.07 Complaint site is required if complaint is type "Chief complaint"

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10775)
The organ system is required if the complaint is of type "Chief complaint"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Complaint Organ System (CONF:10782)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11169)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10768)/@code="10154-3" Chief complaint Narrative - Reported (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10769)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11170)
effectiveTime.low = NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="ST" (CONF:10770)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.04

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:10773), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AnatomicLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.76 DYNAMIC (CONF:10774)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.07 Complaint site is required if complaint is type "Chief complaint"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10771)
This entryRelationship contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Complaint Duration

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10772)
This entryRelationship contains at least one [1..*] observation, where its type is Complaint Type

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10775)
The organ system is required if the complaint is of type "Chief complaint"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Complaint Organ System (CONF:10782)
